desc: We are solar cleaning professionals in California with over 10+ years of experience bringing you the best solar cleaning tools on the market. We are an official distributor of the German-made Sola-Tecs equipment for the United States and South America. We also offer service and repairs to solar cleaning equipment.

layout.text: Welcome to Solar Clean Techs store. We are a solar cleaning professionals in California with over 9+ years of experience bringing you the best solar cleaning tools on the market. We are an official distributor of the German-made Sola-Tecs equipment for the United States and South America. We also offer service and repairs to all the tools we sell.
